mapper.insert: insert into sys_fda (id, drug, drugNumber, describe, pruductId, dosage, effectiveDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pruductid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{effectivedate,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update sys_fda set drug = #{drug,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drugNumber = #{drugnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pruductId = #{pruductid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dosage = #{dosage,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, effectiveDate = #{effectivedate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, drug, drugNumber, `describe`, pruductId, dosage, effectiveDate from sys_fda
